name: Haunted Dungeon (Mark Damon Hughes)
description:
For your crimes, you are thrown in the dungeon. Your ambitions on the surface are over. The only way forward is down, to conquer Hell itself! But first you must defeat the other wretched prisoners, and the ghosts of your own victims.

----

This is a very early prototype, so all you can do today is bash monsters and collect gold. It's going to be better than that.

Also, only Mac is currently built, and I have spent zero effort on making it more portable yet. Eventually there'll be Windows and Linux builds.

If it doesn't launch, or crashes, try looking at ~/Documents/haunted-dungeon.log.

Uses Vexed's Demonic Dungeon art!
